About Me

Let me tell you a few things....

BIO

I'm a full stack software developer with a passion for frontend development and a background in Project Management.

After working in multiple industries, I realized that most of the exciting things happening in business were driven by tech so I learned how to code. I strive to build next-generation applications that provide custom solutions, connect humans and challenge my creative thought process.

Technical Skills

Javascript · Ruby · React · Redux · Rails · SQL · PostgreSQL · HTML5 · CSS3 · Git · Sinatra· NPM

Exposure

Vue · Node.js · AWS · Express · Sass · MongoDB · Webpack · Redux Saga

Others

SaaS · PaaS · Agile · Responsive Design · Strong appreciation for UX/UI development
